name: TruthMuzicRadio
0:
”Alexa play truth music radio”
”Alexa start truth music radio”
”Alexa ask truth music radio what is playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: truth music radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Truth Muzic Radio is non-stop Hip-Hop, R&B, Gospel, Neo-soul, Reggae, Spoken Word, and other popular genres... the righteous way. This radio station is designed to uplift your spirits, whether starting your day, getting you through your day, or winding down. It also has an app, so search the Apple App Store and Google Play Store for the Free app. Several times throughout the week, you'll also hear live on-air personalities and podcasts with hot topics, musical selections and DJs live in the mix. Truth Muzic Radio, Where the Z is for Zion!!!

Website: https://truthmuzic.com
Linktree - https://linktr.ee/truthmuzic

Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/TruthMuzicOnline
Follow Us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/TruthMuzicOnline

Subscribe on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@truthmuzic

Download the FREE Truth Muzic Radio App

Android - https://truthmuzic.com/android
